testCase.name: Testing GET on /api/clients It should respond with an array of clients
Testing POST on /api/clients It should respond with 200 status code
Testing POST on /api/clients It should respond with 400 (Bad Request) status code Case of one parameter missing
Testing POST on /api/clients It should respond with 400 (Bad Request) status code Case of wrong 'name' parameter type
Testing POST on /api/clients It should respond with 400 (Bad Request) status code Case of wrong 'surname' parameter type
Testing POST on /api/clients It should respond with 400 (Bad Request) status code Case of wrong 'wallet' parameter type
Testing POST on /api/clients It should respond with 400 (Bad Request) status code Case of wrong 'address' parameter type
Testing PUT on /api/clients/:clientid It should respond with 200 status code
